attr.title: Flaskoman
attr.desc: Flaskoman is a puzzle platformer in a steampunk laboratory. Use mysterious liquids to activate lab mechanism and your abilities.
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/1645940/Flaskoman) and copy the game files to the port gamedata directory.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1645940/Flaskoman) and copy the game files to the port `gamedata` directory.
